headline: American Tower Corporation (AMT) Posted Mixed Results in Q4
summary: Meridian Funds, managed by ArrowMark Partners, released its “Meridian Hedged Equity Fund” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The direction of interest rates, inflation, and the outcome of the US election all had a significant impact on the markets throughout the quarter. In the quarter, the fund […]

headline: Invesco Rising Dividends Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Underperformance was driven by stock selection in the consumer discretionary, real estate and communication services sectors.

headline: Fitch Rates American Tower's Proposed Debt Offering 'BBB+'
summary: Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB+' rating to American Tower Corporation's proposed two-tranche USD-denominated senior notes due in 2030 and 2035.Net proceeds from these notes will be used to repay...
